Example ratewidget use case

Source: vignettes/example.Rmd
example.Rmd

ratewidget is an HTML widget which works with Crosstalk to calculate and display a rate between the numerator and denominator columns. This rate updates when the crosstalk brushing or filtering is applied.

Try the example below. Click the checkboxes, manipulate the slider and click rows in the data table. Watch the rate update as the data selection changes. The summary text uses four ratewidget instances to show four different summary statistics.

The weighted average power to weight ratio is hp/lb.

Developed by Peter Li.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
